short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find images from selected text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find Images adds a "Find Image" functionality to the context menu when text is selected/highlighted and right-clicked. This extension makes searching Google Images, Imgur, Flickr, or Getty Images one click faster, which could potentially save an incredible amount of time if this action occurs often (as it does for most web users). The different platform searches provided offer different selections of images. For example, searching with Getty Images returns stock photos.
